column4: I am getting a 4 gigs of ram for this computer .  How do I know if I have the hardware to really use a 64 bit os ?
since 64bit lin is free, it's upto your mobo
I have 7.10 64 bit on here and it seem to work ok at 512 and I did have one gb.  Linux uses ram anyways So How do I really know if it going to make any real different.
